website_summaries.verdict: It has some nice features for big tasks, but if you want the best FoodSaver for the money, choose the automatic instead.
pros: A fast 2-in-1 model w/ retractable handheld sealer and viewing window
Efficiently seals large quantities of food

customer_reviews.title: Worked well, for a while...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 2 months of intermittent use. I've had about 6 of these over the years and know what kind of use they can tolerate. With this, my favorite part was the attachment hose sealer in combination with the resealable bags. Perfect for leftovers and cheeses. What I didn't like was 2 months in and the pump started to go haywire. All of a sudden the vacuum pump was twice as loud and barely removed air. i.e. stopped working. I DID buy the extended warranty on it through Asurion but am having some difficulty getting that fixed. If it's within the manufacturers warranty you're supposed to go through Foodsaver. So I'm trying to get that resolved.
customer_reviews.author: K. Keith

customer_reviews.title: I love how easy this FoodSaver is to use
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy this FoodSaver is to use. I keep it on the counter full time so it's ready to use. I use it to reseal bags after opening. I package up meat when I get home from grocery shopping. It's easy to switch bags size. I can cut and seal a new bag while sealing up something else. I've had other styles of FoodSaver and this one is by far the best!
customer_reviews.author: Daizy

customer_reviews.title: Only worked the first few times.
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for the first 5-6 times, then it wouldn’t seal in a 1/2 inch to 1 inch area on the left side. Amazon is sending me a replacement, hopefully this one works better than the first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This FoodSaver was a gift for my son, and ...
customer_reviews.text: This FoodSaver was a gift for my son, and worked for a total 5 weeks. No longer works. Obviously defective product.
customer_reviews.author: sjm10599

customer_reviews.title: Best setup for a food saver hands down!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we’ve bought. We have one for ourselves, and it’s so great we bought a 2nd for the inlaws! Worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working after only 4 months! Are you kidding me?
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere if you want to save your food.
customer_reviews.text: I finally threw this thing in the trash. I've fought and fought with it for well over a year. OEM bags. Aftermarket bags. It constantly hisses while sealing. Sealing a bag takes 10 tries. Then even after it's "sealed" it's still crap and leaks. I've had meals in the freezer ruined. I've had sous vide meals ruined. Of all of my kitchen appliances, this one is least reliable. Maybe I got a dud. I dunno, but I'm done with it either way.
customer_reviews.author: DGlaser3

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: We've had several food savers over the years and I have to say "this is the best one we ever had". Super easy to seal any kind of package. Chips, cereal, frozen vegetables, simply anything. The best part is how, when you pull out the material to make a new bag, you roll out just what you need and cut the material and seal the next one at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Youngberg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I order 1/4 of cow at a time (100+lbs) and this thing has been a lifesaver for vac sealing and freezing meat info meal portions. Fairly easy to use once you figure it out. Wont accommodate a 50ft roll of plastic because that forces you to buy FoodSaver's brand bags at twice the price. I save the old cardboard tube and just split rolls in half to remedy. Great product so far.
customer_reviews.author: crystal w.

customer_reviews.title: The strong vacuum & sealing qualities
customer_reviews.text: This is a great unit when you find what works best for " you". I purchased extra bags to get the feel of it, I'm on a roll now! I purchased some meat from the market didn't use it all, I packaged the rest and used their lable! It's loud but so is my Vitamix and I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Red flag!!!
customer_reviews.text: The one I threw away work a hundred times better than this one. It has absolutely no suction! With dehydrated cilantro it took out maybe one tenth of the air out of the bag before it's sealed every single time. I thought maybe I might get one bag out of 15 oh, no! It sucks! On the contrary oh, excuse me, it doesn't suck! Do not buy! At least from this vendor! Red flag! Red flag!! Red flag!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: I really like this unit
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I really like this unit. I keep it on the counters and use it all the time. When using for cheese I make the package a little larger than normal so I can re-seal the same bag until item is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and keeps food fresh much longer than expected. I divided brisket into individual packages so my busy family could just grab and go. That was over 6 weeks ago. I opened the last package today and it is still just as fresh and perfect as the day I sealed it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette

customer_reviews.title: Useless for fresh vegetables! Rancid after 2-3 days!
customer_reviews.text: My mom bought this for me when COVID-19 broke out because I have 2 ESA bunnies and was worried about the availability of produce for their daily salads. Went through setup, made individual daily salads & when I opened the first one 3 days later it literally made me sick - horrible, horrible smell! Tried drying them well first, tried leaving a bit of air in bag,...basically everything I could think of & it's useless for veggies. And because it "functions properly" (sucking & sealing" I can't return it. Wasted $150...very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: KMM

customer_reviews.title: 400+ seals, still great
customer_reviews.text: My first sealer. I decided to seal my own game meat. Works really well. it's loud (not good for night sealing with sleeping kids) but seals well, easy to clean, has dry and most sealing option, which you need more than you know. Seems to seal longer on moist seals... the slightest liquid can keep Dry sealing from really getting a good seal. Moist option seals longer, making sure it welds the bag together. Haven't tried accessory marinade sealer yet but nice option to have.
customer_reviews.author: Tim G.

customer_reviews.title: Worst Food Saver I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Several FoodSavers over the years I never had a problem with any of them until I got a 5200. This one does not get hot enough to seal the bag, and it only takes about half the air out of the bag. the seal and vacuum is difficult to operate but does not matter since the sealing part does not function as advertised. There are a lot of good comments about the 5200 and a lot bad ones, add mine. If you buy a 5200 series all I can say is Good Luck.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ellington

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Seal
customer_reviews.text: I tried every way to make this machine seal, I tried making the bags extra long, I tried wet and dry settings. Nothing worked. Also, the "push" down with both finger to trigger the vacuum is a pain in the butt. Ease of use I give it a zero. Even if it did seal properly. It does not suck out all of the air like my old Food Saver does. Leaves air "gaps" between my chicken breast...not worth it. I am purchasing a smaller unit and hoping it seals a lot better!
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Better than butcher paper
customer_reviews.text: Worked well so far. Butchered a deer a few months ago. The meat is still frozen. No signs of air leaks or freezer burn. Will caution on using this bad boy with homemade jerky. The sharp points on the jerky poke holes which keep the bags from sealing. I picked the food saver due to costs. Butcher paper is very expensive. After a few hunting trips, the food saver pays for itself.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler R.

customer_reviews.title: Customer support is fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about the FoodSaver! Most of all, the retractable vacuum for mason jar caps, marinating food, zip lock bags, etc., it does it all and then it retracts right back into the machine. Sealing and sizing the food bags that come with it is easy. I also put up and vacuum sealed 50 pounds of bread flour from King Arther in no time flat. It's a breeze to work. I use it for dehydrated foods too. A million uses...Get one, I promise you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei

customer_reviews.title: 5 machines in 2 yrs...DO NOT LAST!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th unit in 2 yrs. If it was not for the insurance that I purchased, I would never have owned a second one. It is very unfortunate but these are just mass-produced cheap Chinese made machines with a fancy looking exterior. The first 3 units I had a much louder motor that lasted about 6 months before no longer suctioning. I presume after receiving a tremendous amount of returns due to motor failure, they finally started using a lower torque motor. Nevertheless, the new motors, while quieter, still do not hold up to daily use for any more that just a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Miller

customer_reviews.title: Worst foodsaver product I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst foodsaver product I've ever used. If you use it three times in a row, it over heats and you can't use it again for 30 minutes to 3 hours. If anything slightly moist goes in it, it dies and the most and dry lights flash while the machine wont work. Even if you take the tray out and dry it completely, or won't work. Sometimes for a full 24 hours. I absolutely hate this machine.
customer_reviews.author: robojon828

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to work
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Foodsaver. Loved my first two, which lasted for years, but want to upgrade so gave to family and still working great. This Foodsaver was the worst. Bag cutter rips the bags while trying to cut, the sealer bar is hard to operate trying to use to fingers while holding bag in place to seal. By the time you got sealer to work or thought is worked, only part of the bag was sealed. I have wasted more bags and patients then necessary. In the dump it went.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Like this style.
customer_reviews.text: Love this Foodsaver product. Great improvement over the old style I just wore out. I use this almost everyday. I thought it was going To take up so much more room on my counter, but it is only slightly deeper than my old model. The increase in width is very much worth it because you have your rolls right there in the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Bonnie Serrett

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Useful
customer_reviews.text: My primary use for this is to be able to buy the "family packs" of meat at a lower price per pound, and then I can package it up in the sizes that our family needs. The vacuum sealer is very easy to use and set up. I had a little problem with the suction at first--I couldn't get it to suck. I checked out one of the YouTube videos and realized I was putting the bag too deep in the suction area. Other than that it has performed easier and better than I expected. Would definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: LadyDawn

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum is so-so
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking machine, BUT, it does not always take the air out of the bag when vacuum sealing food. That was the purpose for buying a vacuum sealer. Kind of disappointing. I have not had a chance to try the vacuum on zipper bags or containers, as I just received it recently. If it would vacuum seal better I would have given it a higher rating.
customer_reviews.author: Dot

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use ...after a few youtube videos anyway
customer_reviews.text: This is my first auto vacuum sealer thing. When I opened the box - I was a bit overwhelmed. But, after a few youtube videos and a bit of bag waste, this thing ROCKS! It's great for saving money etc but, also for Sous Vide! Also for weed! So many uses! It's a bit noisy but, totally acceptable to me. The lil sucking attachment thing works great too.
customer_reviews.author: S King

customer_reviews.title: review
customer_reviews.text: the product worked well until just before the pandemic hit it broke and is no longer sucking and sealing. tried to reach to square trade whom we got the warranty through and that has been a debacle and they have not emailed me and followed through with replacing the item purchased and our warranty is eventually going to wear out? so I am not happy rights now, this product should have lasted longer, in my opinion but I just want it replaced as I was happy with its service until it broke.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Buy generic bags
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy food saver bags they are a waste of money... joes schmoes generic vaccu seal bag works just as well at a fraction of the price ive been payin 16 bucks for 100’ of bag instead of 15 for 20’ also keep in mind you can use the seal function without the vacuum to reseal chips any othe heat seal bag
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cumbersome and Does not last
customer_reviews.text: Worst kitchen appliance we’ve ever purchased, and I’m old. Very cumbersome two step process, rediculous requirement to use both hands to seal and now it’s broke down and won’t seal at all. I’ve moistened the gaskets to no end. I hate this thing, you should learn from my miserable experience.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with unit
customer_reviews.text: I'm not happy at all with this unit. I've had a foodsaver before but it worked much better. After attempting to vaccum and seal multiple times it finally completed the task except it's not a very strong vacuum on bag. 2 bags didn't vaccum at all. Bag was inserted properly in a brand new unit. Just not happy at all. Today was my first time using the new unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great when it worked
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked great initially. I've had it for about two months now, and there would be times when the pump would stop working, and now it doesn't seem to pull any vacuum. I guess I'll have to contact the manufacturer and see what sort of warranty they offer, because right now its the most expensive, noisy paperweight I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Rachara

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son, Christmas gift. I thought this was an automatic but I guess I didn't read the description well. I have a 5480 model which is automatic. This is more manual which is not bad at all. I just started out with a model more automatic. It's stands up to the Foodsaver brand.
customer_reviews.author: KATHY

customer_reviews.title: Great food saver
customer_reviews.text: Received the sealer yesterday and tried it out this morning. Limited usage so far but I love it at this point. Extremely easy to set up and start using. Very simple operation and ergonomically well designed. Takes up very small area of the counter utilizing a more vertical stance than previous or other brand machines. Controls are well labeled and easy to understand. Vacuum and sealing process is very quick works great.
customer_reviews.author: Wildwood

customer_reviews.title: Good little machine
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a great vacuum sealer. I tend to use these enough to fry them out so we'll see how long it lasts. l like the set up of the machine the bottom sealer and cutter being separate from the main sealer is sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love! Love! Love it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned and used a FoodSaver machine for over 15 years. I was presented with this new one as a gift....and it is so awesome!!! No more having to cut the bag to size with scissors, sealing the bottom, then opening the lid, positioning the filled bag, closing the lid, & hoping I got it in the correct place so it would seal. The FM5200 makes it all so much easier! And, because I can place it on my counter top, and the roll of plastic is already in the machine, it is a breeze to use. Thank you, FoodSaver!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bones1940

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fast.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. This is our first shrink wrap machine so we don’t have anything to compare it with but...We separated and packaged about 25# of meat in about 30 minutes right out of the box. Will update my review after we have used it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I have been a huge fan of food saver. I have purchased over 5 previous products. This one has not held up well. After two months, stopped working. It powers up but does not vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Bright

customer_reviews.title: it was defective.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to load bags, light keeps flashing when seal function is on Won,'t seal ...it stops before seal is finished I got a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: ShezaRealtor

customer_reviews.title: It does not work.
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible. I will not suction the larger bags it came with. It works somewhat on smaller bags, but inconsistently. And I cannot even return it.
customer_reviews.author: Madagascar

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, powerful suction... Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted one of these for a long time. I bought a different brand 1st due to price difference... that was a mistake! Suction sucked! (Pun intended). Had no power and was tricky to use. Returned it the next day and bought this one and I'm very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Edna R. Preciado

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Every household, IMO, should have one of 0 if they want to save money! There are only two of us, in our household, but we prefer to buy food products, especially meats, in the family size containers, as it is usually more economical that way, and then divide it up into the size portions that we need. And, these Food Savers have saved us so much money! This is the second one that we have purchased, and it is differently worth what we paid for it. But,one of the best features, is that it has a place to store the bags in it, which saves on having to find additional storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Momma to Bear

customer_reviews.title: It Looks Nice! About it.
customer_reviews.text: With the suction placed up higher from the counter its hard to hold a short bag and press the bar for the vacuum to take place. It takes longer than my old FS to vacuum and seal. I am really not happy with it at all. I would love to exchange for a different model.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this item
customer_reviews.text: This item has changed our life! We use it daily with the resealable bags and containers (Accessories attachment). We bought it in September and it had paid for itself by January. PLUS my husband lost 20 pounds! We were able to make individual portions of meat and only thaw/cook the appropriate meal about..... so no more overestimating and overeating! I highly recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one about 6 months ago and I love how easy it is to use. I liked it so much I bought my mom one yesterday. We have used FoodSavers for over 10 years and this is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Jynx242

customer_reviews.title: For the money that was paid to get a damaged product is disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box... two dents in the front. Have not turned it on yet. Later review on this FoodSaver. I love it. Dents and all. During COVID you are lucky to find one. Wish I would have gotten one years sooner.
customer_reviews.author: CaT

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended. Use it a lot!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this all summer. Love it. Only negative would be that the off-brand rolls are too big around. So when I used the ones that came with it, I kept the core and spooled off about 1/2 of the off-brand onto the other core. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Nib

customer_reviews.title: Even worse, the gaskets were bad
customer_reviews.text: This is a clumsy device. After using my old FoodSaver for several years, I had to replace it. The pushbar design is very clumsy. Even worse, the gaskets were bad, and, after 30 days, vacuuming no longer worked. Customer service was TERRIBLE. The only option they could provide was to return the device and wait 3 months for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: DL Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: It's great, the one out of 1,00o times it works. But I'm trying to save food for my mother who is at risk during the covid outbreak. AND IT DOES NOT FREAKIN' WORK. It just doesn't. Oh, the vacuum definitely is functional. But if you want to save food, it doesn't do anything. It's trash. I have one at home that works like a dream. This one? Trash. Total failure and disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: FoodSaver Saver!
customer_reviews.text: Thank God for my FoodSaver! We can store meats, cooked fresh vegetables and other perishables for years to come. The food saver is worth every penny. No more freezer burned foods. It's also a good way to spend time in the kitchen with your honey while you're using the machine to save money. 😁
customer_reviews.author: K. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying this food saver. It replaced an older model that quit working. It is so much easier to use than my last one because it has the automatic vacuum & seal. You just put the bag into the slot & press down on the bar until it starts vacuuming. My last one I had to practically put all my body weight on it & hold until it sealed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Coffman

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have gotten this a long time ago! This thing is seriously awesome. I can make big portions, break it down into meal portions and long term freeze it with the easiest thaw/reheat possible.
customer_reviews.author: Jerzee

customer_reviews.title: Seals the food good.
customer_reviews.text: I was checking out other brands for a sealing machine. Was tempted to go with a no name brand. I went with this one and boy am I happy I did. The machine is solid. Process is simple and fast. Frozen food taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Sal your Pal

customer_reviews.title: Takes time to get used to updated food saver
customer_reviews.text: Love the food saver products! I recently bought this one to replace my old one. It definitely takes up less counter space than my old one. Took a bit to understand how to use it. Don't really like that the machine grabs the bag in to seal, but does seal things well. The bag storage works very well to cut and seal each new bag and there is less bag wasting. Does things more automatic so will take some time getting used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Colabuono

customer_reviews.title: Still learning the machine but it is a great product to have
customer_reviews.text: Still learning the machine but it is a great product to have. I have an issue because my hands are small so I have trouble getting it in the vacuum slot and holding it there and then pressing the bar to start the vacuum and seal process. Also the retractable piece is not very retractable because I pulled mine out and it will not go back in. Guessing I pulled to far out and now it won't go back in. Wish it had a button to retract instead
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Herrington

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum does not work as good as my old FoodSaver. I am going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great improvement over previous models.
customer_reviews.text: A great improvement over the previous model. The new design does a much better job of keeping liquid from being sucked out of the bag. At the same time the vacuum seems much more powerful.
customer_reviews.author: marktiscareno

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: We were using a different brand for many years and it was getting old. This one is a major upgrade to the one we had. Easy to use and does what it claims to do!!! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Big "C"

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money 👌😁
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for 9 hours straight. What a tuff little machine
customer_reviews.author: Ken Simrall

customer_reviews.title: This is a great machine.
customer_reviews.text: This machine works great. I used to package beef. It was an entire steer. The machine is a little bit slow for such a project, but for daily use it’s fine. I go to Costco every few weeks and buy vegetables which I chop and freeze. It makes everything so easy. It comes with some bags, but the generic brand amazon sells work just as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mondolando

customer_reviews.title: Bulky and difficult to use.
customer_reviews.text: I found this product extremely difficult to use. Inconvenient bag making. I would not buy this again at all!
customer_reviews.author: Jack A.

customer_reviews.title: loud pump and over heated easily
customer_reviews.text: looked like a nice food saver however after just 10 bags the unit stopped vacuuming. After turning it off for about 5 minutes it seam to work fine for another 5 bags and then repeated, had to do this for the next 20 bags before I gave up and decided to return the device.
customer_reviews.author: Zeynep Kilic

customer_reviews.title: Has great features.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace previous food saver I passed on to my grandson. Works great. Love being able to seal bag prior to cutting size of bag needed. A handy feature..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy with this sealer
customer_reviews.text: We process our own beef, hogs and chickens. I needed another sealer in the lineup. This one was put into a line of 3 sealers. We did 7 hogs in a day. It was well used among the 3 sealers. It kept up and kept going all day. My only complaint would be it has just a single seal strip and the bottom sealer takes a while to make a seal. We have a separate machine that makes a seal on bags so this was not a big problem for us. Overall I'm happy with it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Katie E Schengbier

customer_reviews.title: Built to last
customer_reviews.text: First off, shortly after I received it, it fell about 10'. After I put the pieces back it worked just as it had before it fell. I really like that the lid automatically closes and you only need two fingers to start the sealing process. However, sometimes it's doesn't do the suctioning correctly and I have to manually start the seal or restart the process. Otherwise it works great and the pre-sealing/cutting feature is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: @3Sahra

customer_reviews.title: Learning Curve to Use
customer_reviews.text: You waste a lot of packaging learning how to use it. They send very little wrapping too. The packaging tears easily once frozen so no shuffling things around in the freezer. Pick it up and move the item. Right now I am not impressed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I just spent 2 hours separating 2lbs of active dry yeast into individual serving pouches. It is easy to use and make bags. My only negative is it is a little hard to clean. I have small hands and there is barely room to maneuver when making bags, sealing and cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Works perfectly and is a must have if you cook sous vide.
customer_reviews.author: F. Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this and getting the simple model at about half the price. Too many unnecessary features.
customer_reviews.author: Hamster

customer_reviews.title: A step down for older model
customer_reviews.text: Got a a replacement for the previous model, which I still like better. The bag cut and seal feature is not a big deal, and the older unit was easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: joe dimauro

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for freshness
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem with it not vacuuming enough air out of the bags from time to time. Works great we have sealed about 150-200 bags. Perfect for meat. I tried to do soup I guess I need more practice.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan V.

customer_reviews.title: What a $ saver
customer_reviews.text: Definitely recommend to save lots of money on food. Pretty easy to use, once you get the hang of using it. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marybeth S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Used this for putting up fresh corn and it worked beautifully. I put up 480 ears of corn in one day
customer_reviews.author: Christi Sone

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to figure out which slot does what. Having to position the filled bag AND activate the bar by pressing two spots is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Hudsonite

customer_reviews.title: complete piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: broke within about 8 weeks. the replacement barely functions. do not buy this. find another company. i wouldn't recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: your mother

customer_reviews.title: The best one yet
customer_reviews.text: This is the third foodsaver I have purchased over the last 20-yrs and this is by far the best one yet. Practically hands free.
customer_reviews.author: Jumpingjack

customer_reviews.title: Poor sealing
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. The sealing function ion is less than average. I’ve had several frozen packages lose their vacuum within days. Save your money. Boooo.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to utilize
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Ready to work. We have already sealed almost 50lbs. of smoked pork and smoked chicken, since We received out new machine 3 weeks ago. A breeze to use, saves room in the freezer, extends the life of the product sealed, etc. Easy to pack sealed bags to take camping, care packages for the kids, etc. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Draayer

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best kitchen invention ever made. Keeps everything fresh for ages, especially lunch meats, which ordinarily go bad pretty quickly. Wouldn't trade it for the world!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Koons

customer_reviews.title: By large, save money and repackage for freshness.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Foodsaver vacuum sealer. My previous one I used for about 11 years while living on a boat. It was a fantastic machine. That is why I bought another Foodsaver for my 2nd one. It is a little different and in the beginning I found it a bit cumbersome but now that I have the hang of it, it is great. Keeps my meat in the freezer fresh for a long time if need be. I shop in big quantities and just break it down and repackage and seal for fresh food all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of 2018
customer_reviews.text: This has been my best purchase i made Amozona all year long love everything about. I had pickup a zipperlock machine last year for Christmas 2017 and alway had trouble getting it to vac and seal but foodsaver works like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Brown

customer_reviews.title: I really did not like.
customer_reviews.text: This product was a little to difficult to use. And it did not hold the seal to keep the food fresh like I thought
customer_reviews.author: G. G.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! NOT USER FRIENDLY!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is junk. Super hard to use by yourself so that cause the seal to miss the end of the bag. So then you have to cut the bag open, take the food out and put it in a new bag. I’ve wasted more bags than I’ve been able to use. Terrible design and I hope no one buys this. If you want to buy it, I’ll send mine to you for the price of shipping just so I can not get angry every time I have to seal something. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Coughlin

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRODUCT OF 2019
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS MACHINE. IT HAS SAVED ME A TON OF MONEY ALREADY. IT WORKS WITH ALL MY BOWLS AND JARS. KEEPS EVERYTHING AIRTIGHT AND FRESH. IF I COULD GIVE IT 10 STARS I WOULD. BUT THE REPLACEMENT PLAN THOUGH BECAUSE YOU NEVER KNOW!
customer_reviews.author: K. WORLEY

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from a less expense model and regret it. The product is difficult to use when attempting to seal the package. You need to push both sides of the bar while trying to hold the bag. The bag slicer broke after 4 uses. I wrote to the manufacture about the issue and received no response.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Bought didnt work now havent been able to get my money back from amazon.. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Bought didnt work now havent been able to get my money back from amazon.. Buyer beware
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: Great Food saver
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and make your own sized bags from the rolled bag material. Would buy again. I plan on buying a few hard containers that works with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Get one you’ll love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Works Great!! Saving lots of money already! Food is looking and tasting so much better now coming from the freezer and fridge!! Update have had this now for a few months, food is lasting so much longer and fresher no freezer burn anymore like previous ziplock bags!! No more food spoilage!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It would only seal one bag and then it would give me a error message and couldn’t proceed. Tried calling company and they were no help.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Unit always has difficulty sealing unless bags are bone dry ...
customer_reviews.text: Unit always has difficulty sealing unless bags are bone dry. sealing anything that is the slightest bit moist is never sealed correctly. broke after 1 year (maybe used 10 x during that period) Junk
customer_reviews.author: Matt B.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: This has saved our family so much time and money! We have been able to reseal chip bags, meat, and vegetables, extending their freshness by a few weeks. We don't know how we went this long without it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 9 months ago and it just stopped working. Evidently it's not built for the long haul. I'd call this one a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Good , easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is good , I have used mine 10 times and have frozen meat for 6 months and the food has no freezer burn, meat paste fresh
customer_reviews.author: Lisa abbonizio

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful food saver
customer_reviews.text: Really like this food saver. Had an older model but this one is so much easier to use. One can keep food much longer when it is vacuum sealed. Would highly recommend this food saver.
customer_reviews.author: L**F

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good
customer_reviews.text: Great unit. Having to use both hands to trigger the seal operation is inconvenient when sealing large items
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is very easy to use. I chose this model after reading reviews of others and concluded that this model addressed the issues of the others.
customer_reviews.author: Rich L

customer_reviews.title: Give it some time, different design that actually works.
customer_reviews.text: Operates much differently than other models/brands but I’ve grown to enjoy the well thought out design.
customer_reviews.author: HD Insanity

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I could not get this product to work for me at all. It now sits on my counter collecting dust. I could not get anyone to help me over the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Patton-Hellmann

customer_reviews.title: Does a pretty good job so far
customer_reviews.text: A bit clumsy but I am used to a much simpler version but good so far suction is very good
customer_reviews.author: bill auda

customer_reviews.title: A big hit!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend spent hours having fun with this as soon as it arrived. He made a few mistakes but once you get the hang of it, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Veda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Made one bag and quit
customer_reviews.text: It made on bag and quit. The unit is a piece of something that rhymes with quit. There is no phone support because of the china virus. So back it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Foltarz

product_meta.title: FoodSaver FM5200 2-in-1 Automatic Vacuum Sealer Machine with Express Bag Maker | Safety Certified | Silver
product_meta.description: The FoodSaver FM5200 automatic vacuum sealer system makes it easier than ever to keep food fresh up to 5x longer compared to ordinary storage methods. It reduces bag-making steps by 50%, taking the time and guesswork out of bag making and sealing, along With reducing over 30% of roll waste when compared to previous FoodSaver food preservation systems. Plus, the system provides 2-in-1 versatility for freezer, fridge, and pantry storage. Handheld sealer seals FoodSaver zipper bags, canisters, and containers, and marinates food in minutes.
feature_bullets: Save more, waste less: Meat preserved with the foodsaver system in the freezer can last up to 3 years and still taste fresh, flavorful, and freezer-burn free. Prep-ahead meals, leftovers, and produce stored in the fridge will stay fresh up to weeks later instead of spoiling in days
Express bag maker: The express bag maker reduces bag making steps by 50% compared to foodsaver V4000 models, thanks to a unique second heat-sealing bar to automatically prep the next bag

More convenient to use: Easy view vacuum window lets you easily control where you seal while the open roll storage design lets you see when you need to replace the roll. Plus, led light indicators easily guide you through the vacuum sealing process. Just press the vacuum and seal bar to remove the air that causes freezer burn and spoilage
Very consistent sealing: Equipped with dual heat sealing strips, it's to reach an optimal vacuum level and airtight seal. The fm5200 is durable, high quality, and backed by a 5-year limited

Automatic moisture detection: Smart technology automatically detects moisture and switches to the correct mode to ensure an airtight seal is achieved. The patented removable drip tray will catch any overflow liquid and is dishwasher safe, making this kitchen appliance easy to clean and maintain 8 x 20 inches heat seal rolls and (3) 11 x 16 inches heat seal rolls

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,659 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
